data.title: Crystal Nights
data.meta_description: Crystal Nights is a 1992 Greek drama film directed by Tonia Marketaki. It was screened in the Un Certain Regard section at the 1992 Cannes Film Festival.
data.text: Crystal Nights (Greek: Κρυστάλλινες νύχτες Krystallines nychtes) is a 1992 Greek drama film directed by Tonia Marketaki. It was screened in the Un Certain Regard section at the 1992 Cannes Film Festival.[1]
